msItem.title: Śivagītā

filiation.p: VOHD II,4: p: 100 entry. 1248, New Catalogus Catalogorum vol 34 pp: 73 77

msItem.incipit: 1v 1 athātassaṃpravakṣyāmi śuddhakaivalyamūrtidaṃ anugrahān maheśvarasya bhavaduḥkhasya bheṣajaṃ . na karmmaṇāmanuṣṭhānais na dānaistapasāpi vā 1v 2 kaivalyaṃ labhate martyaḥ kintu jñānena kevalaṃ . rāmāya daṇḍakāraṇye pārvatipatinā purā yā proktā śivagītākhyā gūḍhāt gūḍhyatamā hi sā .
msItem.explicit: 42r 1 munisattamāḥ . ṛṣayaḥ . adyaprabhṛti nassūta tvamācāryaḥ pitāguruḥ . avidyāyāḥ paraṃ pāraṃ yasmāttādhitāsa naḥ utapā(t)[d]akabrahmadātro garīyān 42r 2 brahmadaḥ pītā . tasmāsutātmaja tvattāssamo nānyāsti no guruḥ .ityuktvā prayayussarve sāyaṃsandhyāmupāsitum . stavantaṃ sūtapūtraṃ te santuṣṭā 42r 3 gomatitaṭe . .. itīdaṃ tatsaditi śrīpādmemahapurāṇe śivagītāsūpaniṣatsu brahmavidyāyāṃ yogaśāstre śivarāghavasaṃvāde adhikā 42r 4 ranirūpaṇannāma ṣoḍaśodhyāyaḥ . … .. śrīsāṃbasadāśivāya namaḥ . . śubhamastu . yādṛśaṃ pustakaṃ dṛṣṭvā tādṛśaṃ likhitaṃ 42r 5 mayā abaddhaṃ vā subabaddhaṃ vā mama doṣo na vidyate . ānandamūlaguṇapallavatattvaśākhā vedāntapuṣpaphalamokṣarasā 42r 6 bhhipūrṇāṃ cetovihaṃga śīvakalpataruṃ vihāya saṃsāraśuṣkaviṭape kiṃ idaṃ karoṣi ..
msItem.colophon: 42r 6 vikāri nāmasaṃvatsaraṃ phālguṇamāsaṃ 42r 7 19 ….. vayavakkāvvur ekāṃbraṃ svahasta likhitaṃ śivagītākhyā gūḍhaṃ saṃpūrṇaṃ .. śubhamastu …

origin.origDate: According to colophon the manuscript was completed in Vikāri saṃvatsara so according to Gregorian it cannot be after 1900.. it was written during Feb-March of Vikāri samvat.
